readable.title: 3339558806_b4afdc8394
readable.content: A lady sits on a porch swing in the yard while a girl sits on the ground by her . A woman and child sit on a bench in a yard covered with fallen leaves . A woman in a red shirt and bandanna and a girl in a blue shirt are sitting on a large swing in front of a house The mother and child have a personal moment in the yard . Womand and girl sitting on a wooden swing
